entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
